spell.name: Pisces
spell.combatDescription: * Place a Magician on Pisces. * Search your deck for a card (Clever: 2 cards), place it in your hand, and then shuffle the deck. * At the end of the turn, discard The Magician.
spell.skillDescription: * Any time you want, throw a spectral grappling hook. * This can be used to grab distant things or to set up difficult climbs.
